text:
Zugo Services are looking for an experienced Python engineer for a role focused on our tracking & analytics platform. The salary offer for this position is in the range of £40k/£50k per annum and includes a discretionary bonus of up to 10% depending on individual and/or company performance.

Required: * Interest in MR and distributed data analytics

Preferred: * Non-trivial experience with DISCO, Tornado, SQLAlchemy, nosetests * Experience of optimising TCP/IP kernel and Nginx configurations for managing high load

for more info. contact recruitment@zugoservices.com
